title: LOVECRAFT COUNTRY Episode 5 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: I also realized my Canadian accent is so bad when I say the word potion around 1:09 🧪🍁😂

Hopefully any racial criticism you received was constructive. Personally, as a black man, I wholly appreciate the effort you take to educate both yourself and your viewers.

Extra kudos that you're Canadian!!! All the more reason to love your channel. Keep up the great work!
I’m Black and you do a great job explaining this show! You never Offended me! Keep up the great work ❤️
You're trying, which is all anyone can ask in my opinion. No one has it completely right on anything, but an effort to understand is key. I appreciate you for that.
my mom and I both love this show and she told me something interesting the term "going on safari" was slang she heard growing up, slang for having sex with POC like the term jungle fever
description:
In this video we take a deep dive, review, recap, and breakdown episode 5 "Strange Case" of HBO's latest series Lovecraft Country based off the book by Matt Ruff. Review, recap, and easter eggs!
